name: Splintterisland EX
description:
Welcome to Splintterisland EX, an action-packed RPG.

-Battle
Splintterisland EX features action-packed anime RPG gameplay, card-based strategic gameplay, presented in stunning animation and visuals.

-Multi-player experience
Compete and social with global users online.
Coordinate with your friends and grasp victory, join guild and grow powerful together.

-Play Simple, Battle Smart
Each of the elves has different spells and stats, create your own battle team strategically to dominate the competition.

Experience a new adventure, become a legend now!
